title: Bi-Weekly Music Discussion Thread
selftext:
What is r/India listening to? Share and discuss songs, playlists, artists, or anything music-related here!

If you're a musician yourself, please share your work so we can all hear what up-and-coming musicians are doing these days.

Don't just mention stuff, link it! Links that are official and provided by the artists themselves are preferred.

**Music Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Music+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/06d0xwq1x8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=4195dbb767ebd70a3209ea46a4497062e788c176
comments:
My three recos for the thread:  

Nils Hoffmann – 9 Days. Beatport calls this 'melodic house'.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vjyh00B7mi4  

Ondara – An Alien In Minneapolis. Love this guy's voice.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tdHLteZyvrg&t=65s  

Lord Huron & Sarah Dugas – Ton Autre Vie. French and languid.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4PrqoHvaRCU

So the non musician me and some of my non musician friends got together to release a song.. Here goes: use the link to listen on your favourite streaming platforms or on YouTube!  


Secret Side Project — "Dil Ke Tukde (feat. Shibs)" \[Disco, Pop\] (2022) [https://linktr.ee/secretsideproject](https://linktr.ee/secretsideproject)

A dance number about heartbreak and moving on in the style of the 80s Bollywood Disco genre pioneered by artists like Biddu, Bappi Lahiri.  
Hope you enjoy it! Thank you!
